pr_body:
Context
---
This is the work submission of my GSoC project.
I have created [6 blog posts on the Dino blog](https://dino.im/blog/author/patiga/) which document my progression.

This pull request tracks the integration of [XEP-0447: Stateless file sharing (SFS)](https://xmpp.org/extensions/xep-0447.html) into Dino

The Idea Behind SFS
---
The XMPP protocol accumulated a variety of methods for delivering files to other participants.
Starting with the [OoB Data](https://xmpp.org/extensions/xep-0066.html), and then multiple peer-to-peer methods via [Jingle](https://xmpp.org/extensions/xep-0166.html) and probably more of which I'm unaware.

SFS tries to integrate with as many of those methods as possible by exposing a general file transfer message which exposes a list of sources where the corresponding file can be retrieved from.
This allows file transfers to have a unified feature set. Hashes, thumbnails and metadata in general is done via the same element, making extending such features easy without code duplication.

XEPs implemented
---
[XEP-0447: Stateless file sharing](https://xmpp.org/extensions/xep-0447.html)
[XEP-0446: File metadata element](https://xmpp.org/extensions/xep-0446.html)
[XEP-0264: Jingle Content Thumbnails](https://xmpp.org/extensions/xep-0264.html)
[XEP-0300: Use of Cryptographic Hash Functions in XMPP](https://xmpp.org/extensions/xep-0300.html)

Work Done
---
While the blog posts cover most of what I've done, here is a short summary of the major points:
- Implement the mentioned XEPs, including sending and receiving their struct-representation
- Database integration
  - 3 New tables: SFS sources, Thumbnails, File Hashes
  - More metadata columns in the File Transfer table
- Add XMPP "Stream Module" for SFS which exposes signals SFS signals and methods for sending (xmpp-vala)
- Integration of SFS into (Dino's) file manager (libdino)
- List of File Metadata Providers to support metadata extraction from different file types
- UI: Add element for displaying file previews

Pending
---
Testing: Audio and Video metadata extraction doesn't seem to reliably work. Source attaching also still needs to be tested.
Review: The code should be reviewed and will be changed to solve issues that are found.
Pre-Merge: The database version should be decreased to the current one + 1. For the incremental coding, I had to increase the version for each database change. Also, some debug prints are still in the code.
